DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacodynamic effect clopidogrel platelet inhibition pharmacokinetic profile clopidogrel carboxylic acid metabolite generic reference clopidogrel product Thai healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Pharmacodynamics Pharmacokinetics Study Generic Reference Clopidogrel Products
DOC.detailed_description: Platelet aggregation ( ex vivo ) measure use Whole blood impedence aggregometry ( Chrono-log® ) VerifyNow® P2Y12 assay . Plasma concentration clopidogrel carboxylic acid metabolite measure High performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 45 year Body mass index 1825 kg/m2 No clinically significant abnormality , confirm medical history ; detailed physical examination ; clinical laboratory analysis ( blood hematology , biochemistry , prothrombin time , bleed time , urinalysis ) An allergy drug ; and/or history drug and/or alcohol abuse . Subjects donate blood within 3 month prior start study participate another investigational drug study within 3 month prior start study Participating subject instruct abstain use drug least 2 week throughout study .
